margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員張嘉郡等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">33</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、本條修正第一項第二款第二目之一。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、目前政府財政持續惡化，<span LANG="en-US">96</span>年度中央政府債務未償餘額數以高達<span LANG="en-US">3</span>兆<span LANG="en-US">8000</span>億元以上，始得社會福利支出受限於政府財政負擔。且地方政府財政困窘及公益捐贈收入驟減，始得國內慈善、公義與社會福利團體，面臨嚴重斷炊。為獎勵個人及企業捐助，參與公益事業，促進社會資源有效運用，建議調高個人綜合所得總捐贈列舉扣除額之比例為<span LANG="en-US">30%</span>。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、新增第十七條，教育特別扣除額之項目。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">四、為能徹底落實國民基礎教育，提升教育素質及發揮國家競爭力，減輕父母沈重負擔，故提出教育學費特別扣除額新增扣除範圍，增加子女學齡前教育機構及高中等學費扣除額。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">五、鑑於獎學金制度乃為鼓勵優秀學子奮發圖強及帶動閱讀風氣，現行條例以『領有獎學金』作為特別扣除額額之例外規定，顯有變相懲罰之意，與獎學金制度之精神相違背，為重申政府重視投資教育之必要性，故建議刪除。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">修正前條文，規定每一申報戶每年僅得二萬五千元，對於兩名以上子女同時就讀大專院校之家庭顯非公平，故修正為每人每年，並搭配第五條之一同時修正。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員林建榮等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">17</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、原「捐贈」列舉總額不得超過綜合所得總額百分之二十為限之規定擬提高上限到百分之四十，以鼓勵人民對於教育、文化、公益、慈善機構或團體之捐贈風氣。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、原列舉扣除「保險費」每人每年扣除數額以不超過二萬四千元為限之規定擬提高一倍為四萬八千元。當前，人民對於人身保險之需求意識提高，民眾參加人身保險，可減少政府移轉性支出（如社會救助支出），現行規定每人每年二萬四千元之扣除額早已不敷實際需求，應大幅提高一倍，為每人每年四萬八千元之扣除額。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、「薪資所得特別扣除額」由每人每年七萬五千元提高為八萬元，讓長年辛苦的受薪階級酌予分享政府稅改、增加國庫收入的成果。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">四、特別扣除額中「殘障特別扣除」原來每年每人只有六萬三千元，應不低於薪資所得特別扣除，爰比照提高為八萬元，俾落實政府照顧身心障礙者之美意，未來亦應逐年調高本項特別扣除額。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">五、特別扣除額中「教育學費扣除額」原規定納稅義務人之子女就讀大專以上院校之子女教育學費每年得扣除二萬五千元，早已不符實際需求，擬修訂為「納稅義務人本人、配偶及撫養親屬就讀學前幼稚園、托兒所及高中以上學校教育學費每年得依實際支出數額檢附收據扣除之。教育學費包括學費、雜費等費用。（理由另詳見總說明五）</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員黃淑英等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">33</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、按國民年金法之立法說明指出，「我國在實施公教、軍、勞保等職域性社會保險多年後，為使全體國民均能享有老年基本經濟安全保障，亦有必要將為享有任何社會保險之國民納入社會保險予以保障，因此，國民年金保險之規劃，即係以未能享有社會保險老年給付保障之國民約三百五十三萬人為主要保障對象，而經由國民年金之開辦，將使我國之社會安全網得以全面性建構，以落實全民照顧之理念。」，顯見國民年金在性質上與勞、軍、公等保險相同，皆是以老年經濟保障為主體之社會保險，其不同之處僅是被保險人為任何社會保險之國民。為求所得稅課徵上之平等對待，比照軍、工、教以及勞工保險，將國民年金保險費明列入所得稅之保險費扣除額範圍內，爰於第一項第二款第二目之<span LANG="en-US">2</span>列舉扣除額保險費之部分增列「國民年金」。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、因應身心障礙者權益保障法（原身心障礙者保護法）及精神衛生法之修正，本條第一項第二款第三目之<span LANG="en-US">4</span>，酌予調整相關條文之條次。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員陳啟昱等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">17</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、相較於過去社會結構單純，台灣社會環境近年來有重大變遷，國內離婚率上升，造成單親家庭增加，致使許多單親家庭必須獨立肩負撫養子女與年長雙親之責，負擔日益沉重。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、尤以年收入所得未達三十萬之低收入家庭，遭遇意外、疾病而喪偶成為單親家庭者，更必須同時肩負小孩教養以及生計問題，政府應當考慮特殊境遇之家庭，減輕單親家庭納稅義務人之負擔。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、故放寬年收入為本法第五條第一級課稅標準之單親家庭者，因配偶死亡、失蹤或經法院判決離婚之單親家庭之免稅扣除額，其免稅額得增加百分之五十。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">四、台灣進入高等教育普及化時代，年輕就業人口以半工半讀方式再繼續深造之情況日益普遍，惟現行所得稅法第十七條之教育學費特別扣除額規定僅限於納稅義務人之子女，將納稅義務人本人排除在外，實未考慮到現今社會之情況，應予以修正。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">五、近年政府就學貸款放款逐年增加，國內大學學費也跟著調漲；再者，根據教育部統計，近十年來大學學生數由<span LANG="en-US">87</span>學年度的<span LANG="en-US">410</span>千人，增加到<span LANG="en-US">96</span>學年度的<span LANG="en-US">987</span>千人，即以倍數成長；又碩士學生數由<span LANG="en-US">87</span>學年度的<span LANG="en-US">43</span>千人，到<span LANG="en-US">96</span>學年度時已經有<span LANG="en-US">172</span>千人，成長幅度驚人。這些數據顯示出教育學費支出已是全民支出的一大部分。然觀現行所得稅法第十七條規定每戶每年的教育特別扣除額以二萬五千元為上限，已不合乎時宜，應以納稅義務人為單位，每人每年以二萬五千元為限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">修正第二款第<font FACE="Times New Roman, serif">(</font>三<font FACE="Times New Roman, serif">)</font>目之<font FACE="Times New Roman, serif">5</font>關於教育學費特別扣除之規定，使納稅義務人、配偶及其子女就讀大專以上院校之教育學費，均得列為扣除，以解決現行納稅義務人本身不得列報教育學費特別扣除之不合理規定。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員林正二等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">27</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、隨著知識經濟時代的到來，個人自費進修充實工作上、生活上所需的知能，為社會趨勢。況且在職進修學費支出都比一般學費要高出許多。惟納稅義務人本人及其配偶在職進修所產生之學費，卻未列入現行所得稅法中所臚列之適用對象，而不能合法抵稅。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、基於我國現行教育政策鼓勵終生學習，並為促進國人不分年齡老少勤於追求自我成長之讀書風氣，現有法律規定顯與社會的實際需求脫節。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、為落實本法鼓勵學習，減輕納稅義務人教育費用負擔之立意，爰提案修正所得稅法第十七條第一項第二款第三目之五，將納稅義務人及與其合併報繳之配偶列入教育學費特別扣除之適用對象。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">於本條第一項第二款扣除額第二目列舉扣除額中，增訂第二目之<span LANG="en-US">7</span>「<u>體育藝文支出</u>」，其中<u>體育藝文支出為觀賞各項體育競賽（如中華職籃、<span LANG="en-US">SBL</span></u><u>超級籃球聯賽等）；在台舉辨之各項藝文展演（包括戲劇、音樂、演奏、說書、舞蹈、技藝表演、繪畫、雕塑、攝影及視覺藝術工藝品等）；經新聞局核定為國產電影片等三種類型之購票支出。其支出之認定以購票證明為準。</u></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員楊瓊瓔等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">30</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、為加強兒童基礎教育，並減輕父母親對幼兒教育之負擔，特提案將「公私立幼稚園、托兒所學費」新增納入所得稅列舉扣除額，並將「教育學費特別扣除」原先每年每戶兩萬五千元的扣除額提高為每年每人二萬五千元，以從教育及稅制落實全民起跑點之平等。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、本修正案將「教育學費特別扣除」之適用對象由原規定僅限納稅義務人之子女改為新增併入納稅義務人本人及其配偶，以更加落實本法鼓勵學習、減輕納稅義務人教育費用負擔之立意。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、依現行「教育學費特別扣除」規定，「空中大學學費」不得列入大專以上院校學費中，惟空中大學與一般大專以上院校同為大學教育，且同樣取得學士學位，將之排除在扣除範圍外實有失公允，故本修正案將空中大學自排除項目中刪除。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員楊瓊瓔等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">33</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、現今社會單親家庭與日俱增，失婚的爸比媽咪們除了要調整自己的心態，重新面對新的人生，還要負起小孩的教養問題，根據國內外的研究均顯示，單親家庭普遍存在著經濟上的問題及困擾，其中又以女性為主的單親家庭最為嚴重，許多女性缺乏謀生能力及經濟自主權，因此在缺乏配偶經濟支持之下，容易導致貧窮產生。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、無論是喪偶或是離婚，對於單親獨力支撐家庭的經濟常是顯得非常吃力，甚至是難以改善。政府常為獎勵高科技產業或龍頭產業，常常以減稅為手段，使得相關產業有發展空間，相對的，稅法是政府藉以重新分配社會財富，藉由高所得所徵得的高稅額，來照顧低收入戶與特殊境遇家庭，但是現行所得稅法第十七條所列舉減免稅額之範圍中，並未考量單親家庭之遭遇，給予合理之減免稅額，以減輕單親家庭納稅義務人之負擔，達成所得重分配之效果。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、為符合公平正義原則，修正案中針對年所得未達第二集課稅標準（<span LANG="en-US">30-80</span>萬<span LANG="en-US">/</span>年）之單親家庭納稅義務人，以及每名受撫養子女免稅額提高百分之五十，但所得超過第二級課稅標準之單親家庭納稅義務人，不在此範圍之內。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員羅淑蕾等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">35</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.19cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">我國國民租稅負擔率雖只有<span LANG="en-US">13.7%</span>，但薪資所得佔報稅所得總額高達<span LANG="en-US">75%</span>，受薪階級之薪資所得負擔過重，有違租稅公平精神。爰修訂所得稅法第十七條第二項第三款第二目、第四目，將薪所得資特別扣除額、殘障特別扣除額，均提高至十萬元，以適度減輕受薪階級及身心障礙者之租稅負擔，照顧弱勢族群，更能符合租稅公平及效率。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">修正本條第一項第二款之規定，鑑於國民年金保險屬於社會保險之一，將國民年金保險之保險費，增列為個人綜合所得稅列舉扣除額中保險費之項目。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、將薪資特別扣除額每年「七萬五千元」增加為「十萬元」。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、將殘障特別扣除額每年「六萬三千元」增加為「十萬元」。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、修正「殘障」乙辭為「身心障礙」。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員賴士葆等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">32</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.19cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">政府應追求教育機會均等，推動多元教育，鼓勵終身教育，並減輕國民教育費用負擔。現今所得稅法規定，全戶教育費用支出扣除<span LANG="en-US">2</span>萬<span LANG="en-US">5</span>千萬元整，立意良善，但空中大學受教育者除外，對減輕國民教育負擔，鼓勵國民進行終身學習，顯然美中不足，有待導正。爰擬具「所得稅法」修正案，使空中大學受教育者，能與一般國民共享公平待遇。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員廖正井等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">34</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、修正第一項第一款，將七十歲以上納稅義務人本人及其配偶，免稅額提高為「加倍」，其直系尊親屬，年滿七十歲受納稅義務人扶養者，免稅額亦同。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、修正第一項第二款，為照顧中低收入者，改善整體所得分配，減少貧富差距，提高標準扣除額，納稅義務人個人扣除<span LANG="en-US">6</span>萬元；配偶者提高為<span LANG="en-US">2.5</span>倍。並提高薪資所得特別扣除額為每年<span LANG="en-US">15</span>萬元，以保障薪資所得者之最低生活水準。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、第一項修正如下：</p><p STYLE="margin-left: 1.3cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.74cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><span LANG="en-US">(</span>一<span LANG="en-US">)</span>第二款第三目之五，教育學費特別扣除額單位由每戶改為每人，以符合租稅公平與一致性，避免不同子女數造成教育負擔程度不同，卻有相同租稅減免之情形發生。</p><p STYLE="margin-left: 1.3cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.74cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><span LANG="en-US">(</span>二<span LANG="en-US">)</span>第二款第三目之五，教育學費特別扣除額由二萬五千元調整為三萬五千元。使租稅制度符合所得水準現況及國人基本生活變動情形。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、第二項未有修正。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、第三項未有修正。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員陳淑慧等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">38</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、修正<span LANG="en-US">(</span>三<span LANG="en-US">)</span>特別扣除額中<span LANG="en-US">2.</span>薪資所得特別扣除額，由現行的每人每年可特別扣除額<span LANG="en-US">78,000</span>元，提高至每人每年<span LANG="en-US">100,000</span>元，以減輕薪資所得者的負擔。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、修正<span LANG="en-US">(</span>三<span LANG="en-US">)</span>特別扣除額中<span LANG="en-US">4.</span>殘障特別扣除額，由現行每人每年可扣除<span LANG="en-US">77,000</span>元，提高至每人每年<span LANG="en-US">100,000</span>元，以落實照顧弱勢族群之目的。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、修正<span LANG="en-US">(</span>三<span LANG="en-US">)</span>特別扣除額中<span LANG="en-US">5.</span>教育學費特別扣除額，由現行納稅義務人之子女每戶得列教育學費特別扣除額<span LANG="en-US">25,000</span>元，改為受扶養親屬其就讀大專以上院校之教育學費每人每年得扣除<span LANG="en-US">25,000</span>元。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">四、反應現今許多單親家庭之社會現狀問題，許多納稅義務人多為兄姊扶養弟妹情況，若教育學費特別扣除額僅限於子女身分部份，對許多單親家庭甚至是隔代教養等家庭者相當不公平，也無法享受到政府真正減稅之良意。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">修訂第一項第二款，將標準扣除額由三萬八千元提高為十萬元（<span LANG="en-US">97</span>年度綜合所得稅規定額度為四萬六千元），以減輕納稅義務人租稅負擔，縮小貧富差距，符合社會公平。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">增列第一項第二款第二目之七：</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、聘用社福外勞之費用，在申報時得選擇以列舉方式扣除之。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、現行勞基法第二十一條架構下，外勞亦適用最低基本薪資，爰以目前<span LANG="en-US">17280</span>元做扣除額之計算基礎，增定每申報戶每年減扣額度以二十萬元為限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員陳杰等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">20</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、扣除額之標準扣除額偏低，已無法反映目前現實生活情形，且對於有配偶之納稅義務人而言，合併申報比單獨申報之扣除額還低，形成變相之婚姻處罰，故提高標準扣除額，且有配偶之納稅義務人之扣除額調整為兩倍。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、列舉扣除額之保險費，在民眾一般生活品質提高與風險分攤之觀念下，原規定之數額已不敷民眾所需，故提高保險費之扣除額上限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、原房屋租金扣除額於都會區房屋租金行情實屬偏低，政府應照顧這些「無殼蝸牛族」，故提高租金扣除額至二十四萬元，以減輕無住屋者在外租屋之負擔。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">四、為改善廣大薪水階級所得水平，並提升民眾之消費能力以刺激經濟景氣，故提高薪資所得之扣除數額。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">五、在政府逐步提高對身心障礙者補助之門檻，造成其家庭之重大負擔，故應提高殘障特別扣除額，以維護身心障礙者之權益。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">六、目前大專院校之學雜費年年高漲，故應就其學雜費全數扣除；且鑑於學位授予法修正後，空大全修生與依大學法修業期滿之畢業生有相同之法律地位，故不應排除適用；又為鼓勵民眾求學上進，故納稅義務人本人及其配偶亦應適用。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">七、為減輕年輕夫婦之家計負擔，故增定托育費用特別扣除額，每人每年以十二萬為限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">八、為鼓勵民眾終身學習與培養第二專長，故增定終身學習特別扣除額，每人每年以二萬元為限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員林建榮等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">28</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.19cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">所得稅法中免稅額所規定之受納稅義務人扶養者，有關「子女」、「同胞兄弟姊妹」之受扶養者，皆以「未滿二十歲，或滿二十歲以上，而因在校就學、身心殘障或因無謀生能力」為認定條件，然就「其他親屬或家屬」之受扶養者，卻以「未滿二十歲或滿六十歲以上無謀生能力」為認定條件，明顯不合理，導致滿二十至未滿六十歲之無謀生能力的其他親屬或家屬失去受照護扶養之權利，遭制度遺棄而成人球。謹予修正，讓受扶養者之認定條件趨於一致。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員黃志雄等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">20</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、新增本條文第一項有關特別扣除額之運動保健特別扣除，即納稅義務人及與其合併報繳之配偶暨受其扶養親屬之運動保健支出，如購買運動器材、赴健身房運動、參與或觀看運動比賽等，每人每年扣除數額以不超過一萬五千元為限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、有關特別扣除額之運動保健特別扣除項目，其範圍仍應予以明定，爰規定其項目應經財政部核定認可始得扣減，以免發生過於浮濫或認定不易之問題。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">委員孫大千等</font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace"><span LANG="en-US">27</span></font><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">人提案：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">一、本條增列欣賞國內文化創意事業展演活動之消費，得申報為列舉扣除額。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">二、為鼓勵文化創意產業發展並提升民眾藝文素質，行政院於<span LANG="en-US">96</span>年<span LANG="en-US">5</span>月<span LANG="en-US">3</span>日由吳豐山政務委員所主持的「文化創意產業發展法草案」審查會議上，曾討論於該草案第五章租稅中增列「每人每年藝文消費抵稅一萬二千元」、「營業事業捐贈得認列三百萬元扣除額」，冀望能在國內文化創意產業內需市場侷限下，藉此鼓勵國人消費，扶植文化創意產業發展；文建會黃碧端主委亦於<span LANG="en-US">2008</span>年表示文建會將提補充條文，明訂民眾觀看戲劇、歌劇、音樂會、舞蹈表演等門票費用均可抵稅，每人每年列舉扣除額以一萬兩千元為上限。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">三、文化創意產業是文化結合新的靈感、創意，將為國家帶來新的發展潛能與商業化的機會，進而創造工作機會。以英國來說，自<span LANG="en-US">1997</span>年至今，創意產業的產值平均成長率為<span LANG="en-US">6%</span>，高於整體經濟平均<span LANG="en-US">2%</span>的成長率，並於<span LANG="en-US">1997</span>年至<span LANG="en-US">2004</span>年增加<span LANG="en-US">3%</span>的就業機會；而韓國在<span LANG="en-US">1997</span>年亞洲金融風暴後，因大力推動文創產業，其中重點放再數位內容遊戲及影視戲劇，亦帶來總體經濟效益達一兆韓元以上，附帶提升國際知名度。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">四、承上，政府可透過法規鬆綁、土地提供、租稅優惠等作法來推動文化創意產業的發展，其中如能將文化創意消費支出列為扣除額，透過所得稅優惠刺激消費者的消費意願，刺激國人對文化創意產業的內需消費支出，將有助於提升文化創意產業業者的發展潛力及未來競爭力。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">五、另根據民國<span LANG="en-US">96</span>年中華經濟研究院所做研究「文化創意產業發展法」有關租稅獎勵說帖指出：「依據財政部財稅資料中心提供的磁帶資料及政府統計之次級資料進行推估，如將文化創意事業舉辦活動之票價支出，得申報為列舉扣除額，以實際平均列報扣除金額<span LANG="en-US">8</span>千元來計算，每年將損失<span LANG="en-US">45.77</span>億元（報稅單位＜<span LANG="en-US">505</span>萬戶＞<span LANG="en-US">×</span>納稅單位平均人數＜<span LANG="en-US">2.98</span>人＞<span LANG="en-US">×</span>列舉扣除額比例<span LANG="en-US">28.46%</span>＞<span LANG="en-US">×</span>每人實際平均抵減金額＜＄<span LANG="en-US">8,000</span>＞<span LANG="en-US">×13.36%</span>＜綜所稅平均稅率＞）。但如從民國<span LANG="en-US">91</span>年文化創意產業實收稅額為<span LANG="en-US">45</span>億來看，若營收總額以每年<span LANG="en-US">13.28%</span>的速度成長（<span LANG="en-US">2000</span>至<span LANG="en-US">2004</span>年文化創意產業總營收額成長率為<span LANG="en-US">13.28%</span>），五年後營收總額將倍增，實收稅額亦隨之加倍。換算為金額則以每年增加<span LANG="en-US">9</span>億估算，五年合計將增加<span LANG="en-US">135</span>億元。」綜上顯示若透過租稅手段扶植文化創意產業發展，在五年之後其產值將成長近一倍，且隨著產值成長，文化創意產業稅收會逐年增加，最後因產值提升所造成的租稅效益，會高於列舉扣除額所造成的租稅成本。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">於本條第一項第二款扣除額第二目列舉扣除額中，增訂第二目之<span LANG="en-US">7</span>「個人進修支出」，其中個人進修支出是為取得或維持於受雇工作中所需資格而支出，然資本性支出如進修電腦課程所購買之電腦，及因上課所花費的交通費等均不含括。其支出之認定以繳費證明為準。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><font FACE="華康中黑體, monospace">審查會：</font></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.19cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; margin-bottom: 0cm">本條條文除第<span LANG="en-US">1</span>項第<span LANG="en-US">2</span>款第<span LANG="en-US">1</span>目<span LANG="en-US">(</span>一<span LANG="en-US">)</span>標準扣除額：納稅義務人個人扣除六萬元；修正為扣除七萬三千元外，其餘內容均照行政院提案通過。</p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm; margin-right: 0.19cm; text-indent: -0.37cm; margin-bottom: 0cm"><br></p><p CLASS="cjk" STYLE="margin-left: 0.56cm;
